name: test1
description: This project can be use as a starting point for developing your new Stellar Soroban SubQuery project

scripts.dev: subql codegen && subql build && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up --remove-orphans
scripts.build:develop: NODE_ENV=develop subql codegen && NODE_ENV=develop subql build
scripts.start:local:subquery-node: npm run docker:network && docker run --rm --name subquery-node --network subql-network -p 3000:3000 -v $(pwd):/app --env-file .env subquerynetwork/subql-node-stellar:latest ${SUB_COMMAND:-} -f=/app --db-schema=app --workers=1 --batch-size=5 --unsafe
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:build:node && npm run docker:build:graphql

author: SubQuery Team
